title: Infographic: More medical devices may see price regulation - Times of India
text: More medical devices may see price regulation More medical devices may see price regulation It took a little over a year for the National Pharmaceutical Pricing Authority (NPPA) to cap the prices of cardiac stents, which were sold at highly inflated rates by hospitals. Now the lens is on another 14 medical devices that could see a price regulation in the coming months. Here’s more… TNN | It took a little over a year for the National Pharmaceutical Pricing Authority (NPPA) to cap the prices of cardiac stents, which were sold at highly inflated rates by hospitals. Now the lens is on another 14 medical devices that could see a price regulation in the coming months.
